snippet: Gov. Nikki R. Haley of South Carolina says she will almost certainly sign a bill banning abortion past 19 weeks.
abstract: Republican Gov Nikki R Haley of South Carolina announces plans to sign bill banning abortion past 19 weeks.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Nikki R. Haley of South Carolina says she will almost certainly sign a bill banning abortion past 19 weeks.

headline.main: South Carolina: Haley’s Signature Likely on New Abortion Curb
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Haley’s Signature Likely on New Abortion Curb
